title: Why isn't Jayce picked in the current meta?
body:
It's not like he was gutted into oblivion or anything.

He still pokes hard as a bitch.  And with the juggernauts not having a whole lot of mobility, the second they try to walk into range, Q and E them away.

His cannon's first attack reduces armor and mr ffs, where he can just constantly poke them out of lane

He doesn't really lose out to ranged tops either, as his poke is a LOT stronger.

You can't outrun him either.

WHY ISN'T HE PLAYED?
